attributes.action: For the United Kingdom to withdraw from the North Atlantic Treaty Organisation (NATO).
attributes.additional_details: The United Kingdom, along with the other member states, must withdraw from NATO with immediate effect, hopefully leading to the eventual dissolution of the organisation. In the Balkans, Afghanistan and Libya, NATO action has only resulted in an obscene amount of bloodshed, with many of the most powerful nations on earth combining to unleash terrible brutality on relatively defenceless countries. This is totally unjustifiable and must end now.
